channel.title: Bitmessage Installation
channel.description:
Hi there, I am new to Qubes-Whonix. atm I have problems installing Bitmessage as described in the Whonix-documentation.
With Bitmessage, " **2.** Download the GPG public key of Pete Šurda, BitMessage core developer." does not work. It says "new key but contains no user id". Switching keyserver to keys-openpgp-org does not work. I don't know where to download the key elsewhere.
Would be very thankful for any help!

item.title: Bitmessage Installation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:

Information Booster might be Available!

Utilizing other resources to help solve questions/issues unspecific to Whonix ™.

item.title: Bitmessage Installation
item.dc:creator: Strudel
item.description:
Hi there, I am new to Qubes-Whonix. atm I have problems installing Bitmessage as described in the Whonix-documentation.

With Bitmessage, " 2. Download the GPG public key of Pete Šurda, BitMessage core developer." does not work. It says “new key but contains no user id”. Switching keyserver to keys-openpgp-org does not work. I don’t know where to download the key elsewhere.

Would be very thankful for any help!

Read full topic
